title: How to Freeze Flat Breads

steps.headline: Ensure that the bread is cooled before packaging.
Place the flat breads into freezer bags that can be sealed.
steps.description: If desired, place a sheet of wax paper between each flat bread stacked on top of another. This will make them easier to pull apart for thawing.

steps.headline: Place in the freezer.
steps.description: The main thing is to ensure that the flat bread has enough space to be stored without getting broken. It can stand upright or sit flat, depending on the space available. Avoid placing anything heavy on the flat bread or it may break while frozen.

steps.headline: Removed from the freezer and thaw as follows:

tyn: Kitchen foil for reheating frozen flat breads
sentences: Ensure that the bread is cooled before packaging.
Place the flat breads into freezer bags that can be sealed.
If desired, place a sheet of wax paper between each flat bread stacked on top of another.
This will make them easier to pull apart for thawing.
The main thing is to ensure that the flat bread has enough space to be stored without getting broken.
It can stand upright or sit flat, depending on the space available.
Avoid placing anything heavy on the flat bread or it may break while frozen.
Removed from the freezer and thaw as follows: Wrap each individual flat bread in aluminum foil.
